person.persName: Thomas J. Ewing (captain in 5th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry and colonel in Kentucky Enrolled Militia)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Ewing. Married Sarah A. Ferguson Ewing in February 1863 in Boyd County. Resident of Greenup County in 1850. Served in the 5th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry Regiment as a captain from September 21, 1861 to January 3, 1863. Served in 22nd Kentucky Enrolled Militia as colonel from May 26, 1864 to June 28, 1864.
